metric.name: UserActivation.10s
metric.summary: Measures how many non-navigation data hosts where registered on the page when a page was navigated away within 10s without any user activation by a non-user-initiated navigation. Shared data hosts will be counted multiple times.

metric.name: UserActivation.1s
metric.summary:
Measures how many non-navigation data hosts where registered on the page when a page was navigated away within 1s without any user activation by a non-user-initiated navigation. Shared data hosts will be counted multiple times.
Note that these data hosts are also counted in "UserActivation.5s" and "UserActivation.10s".

metric.name: UserActivation.5s
metric.summary:
Measures how many non-navigation data hosts where registered on the page when a page was navigated away within 5s without any user activation by a non-user-initiated navigation. Shared data hosts will be counted multiple times.
Note that these data hosts are also counted in "UserActivation.10s".

metric.name: UserInteraction.10s
metric.summary: Measures how many non-navigation data hosts where registered on the page when a page was navigated away within 10s without any user interaction by a non-user-initiated navigation. Shared data hosts will be counted multiple times.

metric.name: UserInteraction.1s
metric.summary:
Measures how many non-navigation data hosts where registered on the page when a page was navigated away within 1s without any user interaction by a non-user-initiated navigation. Shared data hosts will be counted multiple times.
Note that these data hosts are also counted in "UserInteraction.5s" and "UserInteraction.10s".

metric.name: UserInteraction.5s
metric.summary:
Measures how many non-navigation data hosts where registered on the page when a page was navigated away within 5s without any user interaction by a non-user-initiated navigation. Shared data hosts will be counted multiple times.
Note that these data hosts are also counted in "UserInteraction.10s".

metric.name: AggregatableStatus
metric.summary: Records the outcome of whether aggregatable reports are stored successfully or rejected and why. Recorded once for each trigger event processed by the attribution storage layer. `kNotRegistered` will be logged if the source or trigger doesn't declare aggregatable data.

metric.name: EventLevelStatus
metric.summary: Records the outcome of whether event-level triggers are stored successfully or rejected and why. Recorded once for each conversion event processed by the attribution storage layer.

metric.name: AggregatableReportDelayFromTrigger
metric.summary: Records the time in ms between a trigger and the aggregatable reporting. This is emitted only when an aggregatable report is successfully sent.

metric.name: EventLevelExtraReportDelay
metric.summary: Records the "extra" non-scheduled time in ms it took for event-level reporting. This is primarily due to a report's scheduled report time taking place while the browser is closed. Recorded when an event-level report is successfully sent.

metric.name: Status
metric.summary: Records the status of source registration processing. Recorded once for each source event processed by the attribution manager layer.

metric.name: HasVideo
metric.summary: True if the page contains a video.

metric.name: Latency
metric.summary: The latency in ms.

metric.name: Result
metric.summary:
The final result type of running an on-device auction. Recorded on auction completion/cancellation. DWA content key for this event corresponds to the auction's seller's origin (regardless of whether they are top level or not).
See https://github.com/WICG/turtledove/blob/main/FLEDGE.md for the latest version of the FLEDGE explainer.

metric.name: Result
metric.summary:
The result of the permission check for the joinAdInterestGroup operation. The DWA content key for this event corresponds to the interest group owner's origin.
See https://github.com/WICG/turtledove/blob/main/FLEDGE.md for the latest version of the FLEDGE explainer.

metric.name: Status
metric.summary:
Records the high level request status for every aggregatable report sent to a reporting endpoint. Recorded for reports requested from any API (e.g. Private Aggregation API).
Recorded for every aggregatable report. The sender might retry in case of failure but only the final status will be counted for each report.

metric.name: Status
metric.summary: Whether or not the IsAttributionReportingAllowed operation was allowed by Privacy Sandbox settings and why. Recorded at the time settings are checked when performing the operation.

metric.name: Status
metric.summary: Whether or not the IsPrivateAggregationAllowed operation was allowed by Privacy Sandbox settings and why. Recorded at the time settings are checked when performing the operation.

event.name: SharedStorage.RunFinishedInWorklet
event.summary: Records the completion of the `run()` method execution within a Shared Storage worklet. Only recorded upon successful execution and does not capture early errors.

metric.name: TimeInWorklet
metric.summary: The time, in milliseconds, that the `run()` method took to execute within the Shared Storage worklet.

event.name: SharedStorage.SelectUrlFinishedInWorklet
event.summary: Records the completion of the `selectURL()` method execution within a Shared Storage worklet. Only recorded upon successful execution and does not capture early errors.

metric.name: TimeInWorklet
metric.summary: The time, in milliseconds, that the `selectURL()` method took to execute within the Shared Storage worklet.

metric.name: Outcome
metric.summary:
Records the outcome of a particular Storage Access API permission request and the site that requested it.
Recorded at the time of the request, for every request.
